static_fields.name: Windows Midsize Hakose Gold
static_fields.description: Minase aims at celebrating traditional crafts and techniques from Japan and partners with famous urushi master Junichi Hakose for this edition. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Windows model and pay tribute to Japanese nature. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki.
static_fields.offers.description: Minase aims at celebrating traditional crafts and techniques from Japan and partners with famous urushi master Junichi Hakose for this edition. Hakose’s urushi makie dials are fitted in the Windows model and pay tribute to Japanese nature. Each timepiece comes with its own Certificate of Authenticity and packed in a hand-made wooden box, wrapped in Minase furoshiki.
